messages.subject: Thank you, Pam (was RUL discussion)
messages.msgSnippet: I waited a few hours hoping I would think of the right thing to say in response, but I can t think of anything to say except thank you for the kind words.
messages.messageBody:
I waited a few hours hoping I would think of the right thing to say in
response, but I can't think of anything to say except thank you for the kind words.


Here's something new and somewhat related (vaguely related, and also about
kind words) I've been working on for the past two days (having planned to do it
months ago):

http://sandradodd.com/list


Thanks to everyone who helps people here. Despite the occasional squawks and
shrieks, good work is being done and I like it a place where integrity is
more important than false peace.

Sandra

P.S.
There's more stuff, still not all finished,
here:

http://sandradodd.com/life

Thanks to all of you who sent me stories or let me lift your typical days and
reading accounts.
